amendment.description: To express the sense of the Congress that the United States remain engaged in Iraq in order to ensure a peaceful, stable, unified Iraq with a representative government.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1190 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 0. Record Vote Number: 271.

action.text: Amendment SA 1190 proposed by Senator Biden to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9196-9202, S9202-9203; text: CR S9196-9197) To express the sense of the Congress that the United States remain engaged in Iraq in order to ensure a peaceful, stable, unified Iraq with a representative government.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1190 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 0. Record Vote Number: 271.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1190 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 97 - 0. Record Vote Number: 271.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1190 proposed by Senator Biden to Amendment SA 1136.
